verbose_text: These include CaM, the human adaptor protein complexes AP-1, AP-2, and AP-3, TIP47, Golgi localized gammaear containing Arf binding protein, ADP ribosylation factor, the suppressor of cytokine signaling 1, a lymphoid specific Src kinase, N-ethylmaleimide-sensitive factor attachment protein receptor, Filamin A, vacuolar protein sorting associated protein 18, Mon2, and Lyric.
